name: Denial VR
description:
The concept:

Similar to H3VRs Take and Hold mode, you are tasked with defending points while trying to survive.

Between holds you can stock up on ammo and health items found in loot boxes.

While progressing you will earn credits to buy better weapons.

This is an early stage of this prototype that I wanted to share with you. Let me know what you think.

Compatible Headsets: Oculus

You can watch some early gameplay here:
